SupplierObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

SupplierObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

SupplierObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: When set to "true" or "1", the business process is automatically processed. This means that all approvals will be automatically approved in the system, all reviews and to-do's will be automatically by-passed, and all notifications will be automatically suppressed.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Free form comment regarding the business process.

validation.validation: This Business Process has been configured to disable comment. Please remove the comment or change the setting in the Business Process Policy or tenant setup.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Default the Person making the comment to the processing person if not submitted via the web service.

Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: Captures the Comment for the Business Process.

Order_From_Supplier_Connection_Line_Data.description: Default PO Issue Email. When adding or editing supplier connection with this information, you need to provide either Email Reference or the Email Address.

validation.validation: You must enter a valid email address of type "Business" and usage including "Procurement" for default PO issue email.

Order-From_Connection_Alternate_Name_Dat.description: Alternate Name Text. The value should be one of the alternate names for the supplier.

Order-From_Connection_Alternate_Name_Dat.description: Usage of the Alternate Name. This field is optional - if provided, it'll be used to match the right Alternate Name record for the supplier, along with Alternate Name attribute. If it's not provided, only the Alternate Name will be used to match the alternate name record for the supplier.

Order_From_Supplier_Connection_Line_Data.description: Alternate Name used by Order-From Connection

validation.validation: Alternate Name [altname] does not have correct usage for Order-From Connection
Alternate Name [altname] must be valid for Supplier.

Order_From_Supplier_Connection_Line_Data.description: Flag to indicate if the Supplier Connection is the Default one
Flag to indicate if the Supplier Connection is inactive

Order_From_Supplier_Connection_Data.description: The Element contains individual Order-From Supplier Connection attributes

validation.validation: Select an issue option or order from address for an active connection.
Supplier Connection Name already exists for Supplier
The specified Purchase Order Issue Option is invalid for the Supplier
You can’t specify Default PO issue E-Mail, when PO Issue Option is not E-mail.
Supplier Connection must be owned by the host Supplier
Enter a unique Supplier Connection Name

Select a valid Order From Address.
The specified Remit-To Supplier Connection is invalid for the supplier.

You can only select one Alternate Name with Connection Integration Name Usage.

description: This element contains all Order-From Supplier Connections for the supplier
